Sir Gustaf Athebaldt:
The power of the royals has been slowly eroding for years. The bloody peasants' uprising of a few years ago in Dion is the proof. From this chaos several small cells within the country are gaining strength in preparation for grasping a large share of the kingdom for themselves.
Our kingdom needs young, energetic lords like you to lead it into the future. Once your clan distinguishes itself further, I will join forces with you and lend you my support, although you are already so well-trusted by many people that I expect my backing won't be decisive...
(This quest may be undertaken only by a level 4 clan.)
